author: United_Bricks
title: Review of set 30024 Truck
review:
This is a promotional set that you got with the sun newspaper in the uk on the 11th october. You paid 30p for the newspaper then you go to your local WHsmiths or TOYRUS and get your lego. Its a nice little set.

The build is simple, the colour scheme is blue and white and has some black and grey pieces. A nice piece you get with the set is a 1x2 clear brick and you get two of them. Theres not much to review, it looks like a truck which is good ands it free.
The packaging is a polybag with the lego creator logo on it.

Overall the set is nice and its free.
